review.title: “Problems in Paradise”
review.pros: Pros – Welcomes new ideas and new classes.
review.cons: Cons – Hires part-time with full-time expectation. Challenged ethically with education vs self preservation.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Need to recognize the talent in the part-time educators and grab them before they move on to the competition. Remove those who are out for self gain at the expense of the student body.

review.title: “For Profit Schools - bad idea.”
review.pros: Pros – working with the faculty is awesome
review.cons: Cons – Everything else is a con - you have to clock in and out!
